Subject: Faction Advertising Update (GUIDELINES!)
Message-ID: <95avdg+d1v4@...>

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 1917
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

Allrighty guys, here are the guidelines for faction advertising:

Ad: The ad can be at most 400 by 100 pixels (it can be less, but not 
more). It should contain the name of your faction and hopefully some 
pics or something. You can look around at other ads on the web and 
get a good design. Please do NOT send ads in .bmp format, send them 
in either .jpg or .gif. BMP files take up too much space to load 
quickly. If your life depends on sending your ad as a BMP file, go 
ahead and send it, and I'll just convert it to GIF on my comp.

Faction description page: Allright, first of all, let me explain some 
stuff. When you guys send your faction descriptions, you should send 
anything associated with it as well (background music, background 
grafics, etc..) as email attachments. If you guys don't send 
background stuff in then I will use the default (the TF background 
and no music). Also, you should specify exactly what color you want 
the text to be, or it will be the default yellow. If you know HTML, 
go ahead and make an HTML page and send it to me.

A few guidelines for the faction page: Don't insult any factions or 
bots on it! Facts (like battle results and stuff) are fine, but no 
putting down other factions. Your faction page should include a 
description of your faction, its location, what it does, and I 
strongly recommend a detailed description of the base (if you got 
pics of it, send it to me over email). I would also put in the name 
of the commander and the email address of that bot's owner.

Please remember that this is mainly to make new members aware of the 
factions so that they could decide who to join. This might be kinda a 
waste of time for commanders of factions that don't accept new bots.


As for my side of this whole project, it isn't going too great. I'll 
get they system working eventually, but till then, DON'T send me the 
ad stuff, store it on your comps.
